1.title: The Big Secret
1.plot: The ladies share a big secret.

2.title: Bodacious
2.plot: The guys are all at odds with their women.

3.title: All Over the Place
3.plot: Jennifer needs convincing to receive prenatal care.

4.title: And It Starts
4.plot: The women are very irritable as their husbands try to cope.

5.title: Faking It
5.plot: The ladies reveal the results of their second home pregnancy tests.

6.title: I Got Her Card
6.plot: Jennifer decides to take Richard's legal trouble into her own hands.

7.title: I Have Lived
7.plot: Marcus' ex-teammate shows up at C-Sports.

8.title: All the Voices
8.plot: The guys come to the rescue of William, Marcus' old teammate.

9.title: When the Lights Go Out
9.plot: After the death of a friend, Marcus and the gang try to cope.

10.title: The Misty Vine Hotel
10.plot: Angela's history with Benny is revealed.

11.title: To Tell or Not to Tell
11.plot: Angela has second thoughts about Benny staying at the house.

12.title: The Alarm
12.plot: Angela is restless because of her new house guest.

13.title: Just Happened
13.plot: Marcus questions the strength of Angela's commitment to him.

14.title: The Way He Look's at Me
14.plot: Marcus meets a woman named Ina.

15.title: Just a Kiss
15.plot: Marcus decides to return to his old ways.

16.title: The Silverback
16.plot: Marcus tries to make Angela jealous.

17.title: Make Him Call Your Name
17.plot: Angela plans to meet up with Benny, after Marcus kisses Keisha. While Leslie tries to persuades her not to go.

18.title: He's at the Door
18.plot: Angela goes out to dinner and dancing with Benny.

19.title: A Dangerous Game
19.plot: Marcus and Angela play a game of tit-for-tat.

1.title: A Better Me
1.plot: Angela's step daughter, calls Angela a whore in front of M.J.

2.title: One Last Try
2.plot: Richard reveals that Marcus begged Keisha to get back with him the night before he married Angela.

3.title: The One I Want
3.plot: Leslie battles with whether or not she should tell Angela about what she saw between Marcus and Keisha.

4.title: Deceiving Eyes
4.plot: Leslie is conflicted about whether she should tell Angela that she saw Marcus and Keisha in a weird moment.

5.title: Forsaking All Others
5.plot: Angela receives a certified letter in the mail asking for child support.

6.title: To Lie or Not to Lie
6.plot: Angela tries to deal with her emotions following a letter where a woman claims that Marcus has fathered a child with her.

7.title: For Baby Mama Drama
7.plot: As a result of personal issues, Marcus starts having problems at work; Angela is fed-up.

8.title: Speak Now
8.plot: Angela runs into an old friend.

9.title: For Richer or Poorer
9.plot: Marcus and Angela continue to argue.

10.title: To Believe or Not to Believe
10.plot: Angela stayed with Leslie and Joseph for the night. Marcus must explain to M.J. why he has been fighting between Angela.

1.title: Waiting for Larry White
1.plot: Angela doubts Marcus; Marcus is disappointed when he hears Angela doubted him; Tynik is renovating the salon.

2.title: Your Are the Father
2.plot: Angela is horrified when she see that Tynik's mom resembles M.J.; Marcus, Joseph and Todd are upset by Keisha's presence at the studio.

3.title: The Blind Date
3.plot: Jennifer reveals she is seeing Tommy's father; Angela and Leslie set Jennifer up on a blind dinner date.

4.title: Just Say No
4.plot: Angela gives Miss V the day off; Angela finds a joint by M.J. 's door and fears the worst.

5.title: The Will and the Grace
5.plot: Angela and her old friend Nick go out to dinner. In college Angela told Marcus Nick was gay.

6.title: The Engagement Ring
6.plot: Richard divulges that he is plans to marry Keisha. Marcus questions Keisha's motives.

7.title: The Grand Opening
7.plot: Angela celebrates the completion of the salon expansion.

8.title: The New Employee
8.plot: Keisha's spending habits cause Richard to have financial problems.

9.title: Close But No Cigar
9.plot: Leslie has a pregnancy scare; Joseph's reaction makes Leslie have doubts.

10.title: Mommy Dearest
10.plot: Tina's refusal to cancel her party plans to stay home and watch her brother causes irreparable damage.

11.title: Just the Two of Us (Part 1)
11.plot: Leslie does not want to be reminded that she is getting older.

12.title: Just the Two of Us (Part 2)
12.plot: Leslie tries to set up a blind date for Jennifer.

13.title: Biological Clock
13.plot: Jennifer finds out that her son is trying on make-up and heels.

14.title: Jack and Jennifer
14.plot: Joseph is unable to perform while he and Leslie are being intimate.

15.title: Tommy
15.plot: Richard's bachelor party gets going only after Angela, Leslie and Jennifer leave.

16.title: Joseph's Limp
16.plot: Dominique takes a fall and has to be rushed to the hospital.

17.title: The Bachelor Party
17.plot: Angela convinces Marcus to spend the weekend with her.

18.title: You Are Not the Father
18.plot: Angela begins to drive Marcus crazy.

19.title: To Be Born Again
19.plot: Joseph suspects that Leslie is cheating, but he gets an unexpected response when he confronts her about the issue.

20.title: In the Red
20.plot: The guys suspect Richard of spending company finances when checks begin to bounce.

21.title: Tall M.J.
21.plot: Because of M.J.'s short stature, Marcus is worried he may not be M.J.'s biological father.

22.title: Off the Hook
22.plot: Keisha lets Marcus stop paying child support for Dominique since he is not her biological father.

23.title: When Jenny Meets Harold (Part 1)
23.plot:

 Be the first one to add a plot.

24.title: When Jenny Meets Harold: Part 2
24.plot: Jennifer is forced to reflect on her choices after being intimate with a new man becomes a frightening ordeal.

25.title: Anniversary Sorrow
25.plot: Marcus surprises Angela on their anniversary.

26.title: Momma's Boy
26.plot: Joseph finds out that his mother, Carmen, is coming to town for a visit, but he hasn't told her that he and Leslie live together.

27.title: Mi casa, su casa
27.plot: Leslie momentarily moves in with Angela and Marcus after her fight with Joseph, which causes an inconvenience in the Williams' household.

28.title: Leslie's First Date
28.plot: Leslie goes on her first serious date since leaving Joseph.

29.title: Moving On
29.plot: Leslie goes on a blind lunch date at Ozzie's pub; Keisha arranges an inopportune meeting between Joseph and Leslie, causing trouble.

30.title: Who Get's the Friends?
30.plot: Leslie goes shopping to keep busy.

31.title: The Grand Old Opera
31.plot: Chris, a former classmate of Angela and Leslie comes into town, and coincidentally, is also working with Marcus and Joseph on a potential business venture.

32.title: You Should've Put a Ring on It
32.plot: Joseph comes to realize that he needs to talk to Leslie about getting back together.

33.title: Prenup
33.plot: Keisha warns Chris to get a prenuptial agreement.

34.title: The Truth Stings
34.plot: Marcus and Angela have an engagement party for Chris and Leslie.

35.title: The Big Day
35.plot: Chris and Leslie's wedding day arrives.

1.title: The Runaway Bride Part 1
1.plot: Leslie's worry over Joseph's motorcycle accident causes her to call off the wedding.

2.title: The Runaway Bride Part 2
2.plot: Keisha aggravates the tension between Chris and Leslie; Chris learns that Leslie has conflicted feelings.

3.title: The Ex-
3.plot: Richard apologizes to Marcus over his ordeals with Keisha; Joseph is released from the hospital.

4.title: Can We Talk
4.plot: Joseph returns home during his recovery; Marcus learns that Angela invited Leslie and Chris to the house; Chris urges Leslie to talk to Joseph.

5.title: Leslie Christian
5.plot: Joseph has a meltdown after a phone call from a woman; Chris decides that he and Leslie need time apart.

6.title: Joseph
6.plot: Leslie is distressed when she returns from her honeymoon, having called Chris by Joseph's name.

7.title: Back Down Memory Lane
7.plot: Angela tries to play a memory game with Marcus.

8.title: The Stalker
8.plot: Using one of her old calendars, Joseph begins to stalk Leslie.

9.title: House for Sale
9.plot: Leslie prepares to show a house to a potential client, only to learn the client is Joseph.

10.title: The Kiss
10.plot: Leslie tells Angela and Jennifer that she kissed Joseph.

11.title: Maybe We Made a Mistake
11.plot: When Chris invites Leslie over for dinner to 'talk', Leslie thinks he wants their marriage annulled.

12.title: Annulled
12.plot: Leslie spots Keisha plotting with a divorce attorney when she officially annuls her marriage.

13.title: The Beauty Pageant
13.plot: In an effort to help distract Joseph, Todd starts a Miss C-Sports Now pageant.

14.title: Trouble in Paradise
14.plot: Keisha tells Angela that the guys have a bevy of women at C-Sports Now in hopes that Angela will shut down the pageant.

15.title: Move the Money
15.plot: The guys move their accounts to another bank so Keisha won't have access to C-Sports finances.

16.title: You're Under Arrest Part 1
16.plot: Keisha feigns an attack on herself and has Marcus, Joseph, Richard and Todd incarcerated.

17.title: You're Under Arrest Part 2
17.plot: The guys appear to be missing; Angela, Leslie and Jennifer find them at the police station.

18.title: Stay Out of It
18.plot: Marcus tells Angela to stay out of Keisha's business; Angela meets with Keisha anyway.

19.title: The Exam
19.plot: The guys endure colonoscopies and prostate exams to maintain their health care coverage.

20.title: Keisha's Up to Something
20.plot: Keisha tells Joseph that Leslie's marriage is annulled.

21.title: The Unknown Caller
21.plot: Leslie is exasperated by an unknown caller.

22.title: The Automatic Teller Machine Part 1
22.plot: Keisha meets a man named Eric while trapped inside an ATM room.

23.title: The Automatic Teller Machine Part 2
23.plot: Keisha and her new friend are caught.

24.title: A Woman Scorned
24.plot: The ladies look back at past relationships; the guys try to talk Richard into walking away from Keisha.

25.title: Sleep Talking
25.plot: Marcus is caught talking about another woman in his sleep.

26.title: Stalked Part 1
26.plot: Joseph worries that Leslie's life is in danger.

28.title: Joseph in Shining Armor
28.plot: Joseph takes Leslie to his house until her stalker is caught.

29.title: Reunited
29.plot: Joseph and Leslie work on their relationship.

30.title: A Stalker for Hire
30.plot: Jennifer and the guys think Joseph hired Leslie's stalker.

31.title: Being Responsible
31.plot: Jennifer's fearful of getting tested for HIV.

32.title: Joseph Gets Tested
32.plot: When Leslie finds out about his activities during their time apart, she suggests that Joseph get tested for sexually transmitted diseases.

33.title: How Many Women
33.plot: Angela and Leslie want to know how many past partners Marcus and Joseph have had.

34.title: Todd and Jennifer
34.plot: Todd wakes up in Jennifer's bed after drinking the night before.

35.title: Moving Day
35.plot: Leslie decorates Joseph's house with help from Angela and Jennifer.

36.title: The Proposal
36.plot: Joseph wants to propose to Leslie.

37.title: The Taming of Todd
37.plot: Marcus thinks it's time for Todd to settle down; he sets Todd up on a blind date.

38.title: Marcus and Dominique
38.plot: Keisha wants Marcus to see Dominique.

39.title: For the Love of Dominique
39.plot: Keisha and Angela's argument ends Dominique's visit.

40.title: Who's My Daddy Part 1
40.plot: Richard and Keisha admit that Marcus is not Dominique's father; Dominique overhears.

41.title: Who's My Daddy Part 2
41.plot: Dominique runs away; Marcus and Keisha try to find her.

42.title: Too Much Sex
42.plot: Marcus is all over his wife Angela very very sexually.

43.title: Shawn Part 1
43.plot: A pregnant woman named Shawn shows up at Lady Angie's; she claims that a man name Marcus is the father of her unborn child.

44.title: Shawn Part 2
44.plot: Though Shawn thought she was looking for a man named Marcus, Todd discovers that Shawn is actually carrying his child.

45.title: The Divorce Papers
45.plot: Keisha moves out of the house after serving Richard with divorce papers.

46.title: It's My House
46.plot: Richard does all he can to make sure that Keisha doesn't take everything that belongs to him.

47.title: The Restraining Order
47.plot: Keisha retaliates by serving Richard with a restraining order; Marcus brings in an attorney to help out his friend.

48.title: Please Say Yes
48.plot: Joseph tries to come up with a proposal idea for Leslie; he finds himself struggling with the preparation.

49.title: Leslie, Joseph and the Prenup
49.plot: Joseph discusses the idea of a prenuptial agreement with Leslie after an interesting encounter with Keisha.

50.title: Keisha, the Photographer
50.plot: Keisha wants to know if Richard is hiding any of his assets; she hires a photographer to take pictures at Angie's Salon and C-Sports Now.

51.title: What About Kids?
51.plot: Joseph waits until after proposing to tell Leslie that he does not want children anytime soon.

52.title: The Mammogram Part 1
52.plot: In the spirit of Breast Cancer Awareness Month, Leslie talks the other women into getting a mammogram.

53.title: The Mammogram Part 2
53.plot: After all of the ladies submit to a mammogram, Angela struggles to tell Marcus about the results of her exam.

54.title: Fear of the Unknown
54.plot: Angela's doctor tries to convince her to complete a biopsy when an unknown mass appears on her x-ray.

55.title: I Want Half
55.plot: Richard is convinced that Keisha managed to set him up after he finds out he missed a court date that he didn't know he had.

1.title: Told You So
1.plot: Despite Richard's efforts, he is bested by Keisha in the divorce settlement; now he needs a place to crash.

2.title: Who Got the Keys?
2.plot: The men panic when they find themselves locked out of the studio; Richard hurts himself when he tries to break down the door.

3.title: Healing Hands
3.plot: Richard's back is still acting up; Miss V. tries to heal him.

4.title: A Few Days
4.plot: Richard starts plotting his revenge on Keisha.

5.title: Keisha's Corner
5.plot: Keisha adds a segment to the guys' show called ''Keisha's Corner.''

6.title: Choke Her to Sleep
6.plot: Richard's anger gets the best of him.

7.title: Him or Me
7.plot: Angela is fed up with Richard living in her home.

8.title: Victemetrea
8.plot: Leslie meets with an interesting wedding planner.

9.title: Angela Maintains Control
9.plot: Angela hears about the recent happenings in Keisha's life and chooses to stay out of it.

10.title: A Certified Letter
10.plot: Angela and Marcus receive notification that Marcus is behind on child support of an unknown child.

11.title: Pam's Father
11.plot: A young girl name Pam claims that Marcus is her father.

12.title: Seventeen
12.plot: Marcus and Angela try to bond with Pam.

13.title: Maury Settles It
13.plot: DNA results will prove if Pam is or is not Marcus daughter.

14.title: Curtis
14.plot: Pam introduces Curtis to Marcus and Angela: immediately Marcus and Angela realize that Pam's life is in grave danger.

15.title: Lock the Door
15.plot: Pam shows up at the salon looking for help after realizing that Curtis was behind her own disappearance.

16.title: It's Bedtime
16.plot: Angela, Jennifer and Leslie try to protect Pam from Curtis at the salon.

17.title: Don't Ignore the Signs
17.plot: Richard receives his first post-divorce paycheck.

18.title: The Way We Were
18.plot: The ladies visit C-Sports just in time to overhear Keisha confess her love for Marcus.

19.title: Trouble with the Feds
19.plot: After Angela's cousin is arrested for tax fraud and embezzlement, the IRS comes knocking on her door.

20.title: The Results
20.plot: Angela's mammogram results are in; she stresses out all day.

21.title: Richards Break
21.plot: Keisha brings a man to C-Sports while Richard is working late; Richard loses his head.

22.title: Making Him Suffer
22.plot: Richard learns that there are consequences for abusing a woman.

1.title: Getting Help
1.plot: Richard has to deal with his short temper.

2.title: Evil Is Knocking
2.plot: Keisha tries to alter a situation to her advantage.

3.title: Tomorrow Is Not Promised
3.plot: After learning the fate of his former teammate, Marcus drastically changes his behavior.

4.title: Marsha, Marsha, Marsha
4.plot: Jennifer keeps Angela and Leslie in the dark when it comes to her dating life.

5.title: Addicted
5.plot: An employee has been up to no good on the internet.

6.title: It's a Woman's World
6.plot: Leslie and Jospeh make assumptions about the other's job.

7.title: Fit for a Fling
7.plot: Marcus' friends question him about his recent neurotic behavior and think it may be linked to his motivation to change.

8.title: Two Turtlenecks
8.plot: Richard and Jennifer confide in each other and attempt to keep a secret.

9.title: Against the Wall
9.plot: Angela and Jennifer are in disagreement regarding Richard's vulnerable state.

10.title: True Intentions
10.plot: Angela and Leslie are shocked when Jennifer confesses she has been keeping a secret.

11.title: Three Times
11.plot: Leslie and Angela try to fix their seemingly broken friendship with Jennifer.

12.title: The Flower Delivery
12.plot: Keisha manages to intercept Richard's gift for his new love interest.

13.title: Set Her Straight
13.plot: Richard tries to convince Keisha to stay out of his love life.

14.title: The Magic Trick
14.plot: The guys at the studio are worried that Richard has put himself in a precarious position.

15.title: Jack
15.plot: Marcus deals with the loss of one of his former teammates.

16.title: Do What You Gotta Do
16.plot: Joseph experiences an episode of sexual frustration due to Leslie's vow of chastity.

17.title: Mating Calls
17.plot: Joseph struggles with Leslie's feelings about sex.

18.title: Mother to Mother
18.plot: Joseph and Leslie discuss their mother's socioeconomic statues.

19.title: A Letter from the Attorney
19.plot: Keisha's unusual behavior surrounding a letter from her attorney perplexes Richard.

20.title: Passing the Test
20.plot: Angela is concerned about her health.

0.title: Episode #7.0
0.plot: At C-Sports, the guys receive their paychecks. For Richard, this is his first payment post-divorce. He's struggling currently because he doesn't have much thanks to Keisha. He's unhappy when he sees that all the money he's got left is $1100 dollars. Marcus briefly mentions that Richard's current state-of-mind reminds him of an old friend (a football player) who went through the exact same situation but ended up killing his wife because his anger boiled over. Later, Richard, trying to be civil, asks Keisha to reduce the child support money so he can have a little more ...

plot: Follows the ups-and-downs of married life for Marcus and Angela.::Anonymous
